explains: v. （使）隔热（或隔音、绝缘）；（使）免受不良影响；（使）陆地成岛屿（insulate 的过去式及过去分词）
adj. 有隔热（或隔音、绝缘）保护的
wordGroup: insulated gate bipolar transistor 绝缘栅双极型晶体管

sentences.en: In the final step, heavily insulated exterior walls and windows are slotted in by crane.
sentences.cn: 最后一步，用起重机将高度隔热的外墙和窗户安装进去。

sentences.en: An automobile produces enough heat to warm an average house in winter, and if a house were perfectly insulated, one adult could also produce more than enough heat to warm it.
sentences.cn: 在冬天，一辆汽车产生的热量足以温暖一间普通的房子，如果一间房子完全隔热，一个成年人也可以产生足够多的热量来温暖它。

sentences.en: They wonder if their community is no longer insulated from big city problems.
sentences.cn: 他们想知道他们的社区是否不再与那些大城市的问题隔离。
